General_Description: '''Showboat''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''The theater in [[Patrai]] brings the seas to the people, showcasing one of the region's most prized boats. Find me taking a 'bow'!''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving, located on the most upper part of the prow of the boat of [[Patrai]] theater.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
